alert.note: Alert for Cortland; Madison; Onondaga; Southern Cayuga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 6:22PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Madison, southeastern Cayuga, northern Cortland and southern Onondaga Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 620 PM EDT, radar indicated a line of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Sempronius to East Homer. Movement was north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Onondaga, Syracuse, Van Buren, Pompey, Solvay, Manlius, Homer, Cazenovia, Otisco and Nelson. This includes the following highway exits... New York Interstate 81 between 13 and 22. A trained spotter reported half inch hail and gusty winds in Groton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
